channel.title: 4.Block-Hash-MAC on shesl's blog

item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: Block Cipher Overview property: Diffusion: any bits from the input message should affect whole cipher text. Confusion: with different key, the cipher message should be completely different. 块加密可以用以下一个函数表示：$$C = E_k(x) = f(x, k), x,k,C \in \mathbb{F}_2^{(n)}$$ Requirements of f: Nonelinearity: a minimum distance between f and all the linear, affine functions (confusion). Resist

item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: Hash Functions Overview A hash function h(x) is a map from n bits to m bits where m<n An output of a hash function is called a message digest or a hash value. A hash function should satisfy the following property: Collision resistance. Second pre-image resistance. Given x, if the probability to find $$y \not= x $$ such that $$h(y) = h(x)$$ is negligible, then the function h is called

item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: MAC Overview MAC is used for providing authenticity of a user or source originality. Method for generating MAC: Pseudo-random sequence generators (or stream cipher). Block ciphers through CBC mode. Keyed hash functions.
